about_the_game:
About This Game

HoloRun is a fast-paced, fun-filled game designed for Hololive fans to connect, compete, and celebrate their favorite talents in an exciting virtual playground. Whether you’re testing your skills in a thrilling solo journey or diving into chaotic multiplayer mayhem, this game offers something for everyone!

Single-Player Mode

Challenge yourself in an adrenaline-pumping vertical climb, where every step forward brings new obstacles and surprises. Precision, timing, and determination are your keys to reaching the top! Can you conquer the heights and claim victory?

Multiplayer Mode

Join forces or compete against other fans in wacky, action-packed multiplayer games! Push your friends to the edge (literally), or simply enjoy the chaos. It’s all about fun, laughter, and building unforgettable memories with the community.

Choose your idol

Each idol has their own unique skills, and you can also purchase additional outfits for them!

More Idol coming soon!

-----

This game is published under CCMC Corp(※1)'s Indie game brand "holo Indie".(※2)

This game is allowed to be monetized under the examination and terms of "holo Indie".

Please note that any monetized derivative work games that include Cover Corp.'s content outside of holo Indie is not covered by these terms and is not allowed.

※1. About CCMC Corp.

CCMC Corp. is entrusted with website management (ex: steam) including, examination, publishing and other necessary tasks by Cover Corp.

※2. About "holo Indie"

holo Indie's objective is to cooperate with hololive production fans and creators.

It is a game brand that offers "Game Creator Support Program" for the derivative work games.

For more details about "holo Indie", Please refer to the Cover Corp.'s "Derivative work guidelines".

name: HoloRun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750-Ti / AMD RX 550, 2GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: HoloRun is a fast-paced, fun-filled game designed for Hololive fans to connect, compete, and celebrate their favorite talents in an exciting virtual playground.
supported_languages: English, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
